full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA 'JAM DPAL MTSAN BRJOD KYI 'DON THABS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,'DI BTON PA LAS 'BYUNG BA YIS, ,DGE BA'I RTZA BA CI MCHIS PA, 'DI NI 'JIG RTEN MA LUS PA, 'JAM DBYANGS GO 'PHANG THOB PAR SHOG , ,,BADZRA MU: @003B YE SHES PA RANG BZHIN GYI GNAS SU GSHEGS, ,RANG NYID DAM TSIG PAR GSAL BA'I SPYI BOR AOm DKAR PO, ,MGRIN PAR A'A: DMAR PO, ,THUGS GAR H'Um SNGON PO MTSAN PAR GYUR, ,NYIN MO BDE LEGS BKRA SHIS SHOG , , ,BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS SBYAR BA'O, ,)
